question.content:
**Which of these is a ray?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A straight mark with dots on each end.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/cbbcab5b59a2e45aa342f7cb13c90e4d54f1dbda)
![A straight mark with arrows on each end pointing outward in opposite directions.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/a0f69c4a4e900d0d459cfa820bb05e0028ab7f6d)

![Two long straight marks with arrows on their ends extend from a dot. One long straight mark extends to the right and passes through a dot. The other long straight mark extends down and to the left and passes through a dot. Three blue arcs connect these two long straight marks.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/54b8cc94c80a8576bdb70b1bbb23347b3fc5d082)
